body_html: @mrry Thank you, one more thing, since reading the lower level code could be a bit hard, could you briefly explain how group_by_window is implemented, I read pytorch implementation of faster-rcnn with aspect ratio grouping, they scan the whole dataset and group images with similar aspect ratio into batches, every epoch, shuffle is done between batches, is group_by_window doing the same thing?
